title: Joshua and the shadow
creator_credit: Stephen Bosustow Productions, Joshua Films, John Lange and Kandi Lange
brief_description: Deals with the way people react to themselves by telling a story in animation about a man who reacts to his shadow in many ways, from avoidance to aggression, until he discovers light, a tool with which he can control his shadow. Compares this to the tool of understanding, used to control emotional shadows. No commentary, music and sound effects only.
